issue.title: [Doc] Document prebuffering of parquet / IPC files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14633](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14633). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have prebuffering available for parquet files currently and somewhat enabled for IPC files (soon to be more fully enabled).  While the reference documentation is pretty solid for the feature we should add examples in:

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/parquet.html>

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/ipc.html>

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/parquet.html>

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/ipc.html>
